description.message: TimbrApp Extension is a Chrome and Edge extension that helps you remember to clock in and out at work.

disable_hint.message: the fields and save to disable reminders.

empty_field_hint.message: With empty time, the corresponding reminder is deactivated.

notification_message_default.message: Go to $1 $2. Click here or on the extension icon to dismiss the alert.

notification_message_with_url.message: Click here or on the extension icon to open the URL and perform the $1 action for the $2.
